name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: Fixed constructor crash with comprehensive error handling and logging. Fixed wrong GUID in configuration page. Plugin now loads successfully with detailed logging for debugging.

CRITICAL FIX: Register File Transformation in Plugin constructor (like HoverTrailer) instead of non-executing StartupService. Plugin now successfully loads and registers on startup. This fixes Web UI integration that was broken in v0.0.10.1.

Simplified Plugin.cs following best practices from reference plugins. Removed complex HTTP registration logic in favor of clean reflection-based approach in StartupService. Updated plugin display name to xThemeSong.

Fixed File Transformation plugin registration by implementing proper service pattern. Updated to use HTTP client for registration with retry logic. Improved reliability and compatibility with File Transformation plugin 2.4.2.0.
